requirements.title: Voice-First Conversation Interface
requirements.description: Handle voice input/output for hands-free brainstorming during walks with real-time transcription using Web Speech API or similar
requirements.validation_method: Voice input captures user speech, transcribes accurately, and plays back AI responses as audio

requirements.title: Context-Aware AI Responses
requirements.description: Generate responses using Ollama (llama3.2) with embeddings from past conversations retrieved via universal-rag-pipeline from Qdrant
requirements.validation_method: AI responses reference relevant past conversations and maintain conversation coherence

requirements.title: Automatic Task Extraction
requirements.description: Parse conversations using n8n workflow to identify actionable tasks with priority estimation based on conversation context
requirements.validation_method: Tasks extracted from conversations include title, description, priority, and context

requirements.title: Conversation Storage and Retrieval
requirements.description: Store conversations in PostgreSQL with metadata and generate searchable embeddings in Qdrant for future context retrieval
requirements.validation_method: Conversations persisted in database and retrievable via search with relevant results

requirements.title: Mobile-Optimized UI
requirements.description: Clean, calming interface with nature-inspired colors, large touch targets, high contrast for outdoor visibility, optimized for mobile use
requirements.validation_method: UI renders well on mobile devices, readable in sunlight, easy to interact with while walking

requirements.title: CLI Conversation Management
requirements.description: Provide CLI commands to start conversations, review insights, search conversation history, and export tasks
requirements.validation_method: CLI commands execute successfully and provide expected output for all operations

requirements.title: Task-Planner Integration
requirements.description: Automatically export extracted tasks to task-planner scenario with proper formatting, metadata, and priority mapping
requirements.validation_method: Exported tasks appear in task-planner with correct data and formatting

requirements.title: Insight Breakthrough Detection
requirements.description: Identify and highlight significant insights or breakthrough ideas using pattern matching and novelty detection
requirements.validation_method: Breakthrough insights flagged with visual indicators and stored separately

requirements.title: Daily Planning Workflow
requirements.description: Generate daily plans with priority-based task organization from conversation content using n8n workflow
requirements.validation_method: Daily plans generated with prioritized tasks and clear action items

requirements.title: Vrooli Context Gathering
requirements.description: Pull current state of scenarios, resources, and active tasks from Vrooli system to inform AI conversation responses
requirements.validation_method: AI responses reference accurate current state of Vrooli scenarios and resources

requirements.title: Stream-of-Consciousness Integration
requirements.description: Feed conversations to stream-of-consciousness-analyzer scenario for deeper pattern analysis and insight generation
requirements.validation_method: Conversations successfully sent to analyzer with results available for review

requirements.title: Multi-Day Conversation Threading
requirements.description: Track and reference conversation themes across multiple days to build long-term context and insights

requirements.title: Mind-Map Visualization
requirements.description: Generate visual mind maps from conversation insights and connections using mind-maps scenario

requirements.title: Idea-Generator Integration
requirements.description: Push novel ideas identified in conversations to idea-generator scenario for further development

requirements.title: Offline Voice Processing
requirements.description: Enable voice capture and processing without network connectivity for use in areas with poor signal

requirements.title: Personalized Reflection Prompts
requirements.description: Learn user patterns and conversation topics to suggest targeted reflection questions that drive deeper thinking
